body_html:
it also crashed when I did following:

  • same weight initialization as the tutorial
  • change full_connect to 512 units
  • change batch_size to 200

Training crashed say, at step 3500 (when accuracy is near 99.2%).

body:
it also crashed when I did following:
- same weight initialization as the tutorial
- change full_connect to 512 units
- change batch_size to 200

Training crashed say, at step 3500 (when accuracy is near 99.2%).
